title: Nice Studio for rent in Central Paris
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Nice, bright and comfy studio apartment right in the Center of Paris (quartier Sentier/Montorgueil)
Great location, washing machine in the studio. All equiped, water-electricity, no WIFI.
Available July 29 for a minimum of 2 months (1500 euros per month). 1 month deposit required.

Please send an email for any further question.
Registration #7510214054638
